title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 319.308 - Tripe with milk
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 319.308 - Tripe with milk

State Regulations
"Tripe with Milk" shall be prepared so that the
finished canned article, exclusive of the cooked-out juices and milk, will
contain at least 65 percent tripe. The product shall be prepared with not less
than 10 percent milk. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
319.308

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
